name: Llama the Farm Drama
description:
• Spit, Stomp, Smash!

Spit on everything that moves. Stomp on farmers' heads or wreak havoc with vomit-o-matic power-up.


  • Easy to Begin & Fun to Master

Seamless on-boarding thanks to intuitive controls.. and advisor pigs! Discover fun movement tricks (+famous speedrun memes).


  • Cozy Atmosphere

Hop on top of the clouds or explore deep dungeons and collect shiny gold coins.. but always be cautious! This world is full of hazards such as great voids, fire, lava, electric, angry farmers and two top secret "end-cows".


  • Speedrun

Enjoy fast paced movement and its fun quirks. Sharpen your air control, double jump and trick jump skills. Manipulate physics to become the fastest llama in the world!

Note: As a solo-developer, your feedback is valuable to me. You can directly contact me about anything. Thanks for playing my game!
